job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are currently in search of Senior Machine Learning (ML) engineers with exceptional skill sets and a passion for large language models. Your invaluable contributions will play a pivotal role in shaping our advanced LLM stack.

   In this position, your responsibility will be to:
     * Conduct experiments with innovative deep learning methods to make our LLM products accurate, convenient, and reliable
     * Explore fine-tuning, evaluation, synthetic data generation, and data retrieval techniques to strike the right balance between usefulness and complexity of various methods
     * Develop production components for the LLM platform
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Engineer

We are currently in search of Senior Machine Learning (ML) engineers with exceptional skill sets and a passion for large language models. Your invaluable contributions will play a pivotal role in shaping our advanced LLM stack.

   In this position, your responsibility will be to:
     * Conduct experiments with innovative deep learning methods to make our LLM products accurate, convenient, and reliable
     * Explore fine-tuning, evaluation, synthetic data generation, and data retrieval techniques to strike the right balance between usefulness and complexity of various methods
     * Develop production components for the LLM platform

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes working with large language models (LLMs), conducting experiments with deep learning methods for LLM products, and exploring fine-tuning, evaluation, synthetic data generation, and data retrieval techniques. It also mentions developing production components for the LLM platform. These aspects strongly align with the core responsibilities and evidence profile of a GenAI Engineer, particularly the focus on generative models and building production systems around them, rather than traditional predictive modeling.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Conduct experiments with innovative deep learning methods to make our LLM products accurate, convenient, and reliable' directly relates to the core process of creating, training, or adapting machine learning models, specifically for LLM products.
job_tasks.phrase: Conduct experiments with innovative deep learning methods to make our LLM products accurate, convenient, and reliable

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Explore fine-tuning, evaluation, synthetic data generation, and data retrieval techniques' describes core activities involved in adapting and improving generative models, which falls under the modeling category.
job_tasks.phrase: Explore fine-tuning, evaluation, synthetic data generation, and data retrieval techniques

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develop production components for the LLM platform' indicates the software engineering tasks required to build and integrate AI features into a platform, aligning with building user-facing or platform-level applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop production components for the LLM platform
